eas_text: A civil authority has issued A FIRE WARNING for the following counties or areas: Yuma, CO; at 12:22 AM ON DEC 18, 2025 Effective until 12:22 PM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text:
Yuma County Residents, If a wildfire is approaching your area, please evacuate immediately to the designated shelter below:

Joes / Kirk area: Grassroots Center
Wray / Eckley area: Wray EMS
Yuma area: Yuma High School

Follow instructions from local authorities and do not delay evacuation if the fire is heading
